Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: feedback from AI is much more thorough and clearly delivered so you know how to change but teacher feedback is more subjective so it can be very useful when they have unique insights from their own knowledge and experience but also can be unhelpful when they want things done a specific way and not every operates well that way.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: AI feedback feels more neutral and constructive but teacher feedback feels like more of an achievement when its good and more of a failure when its bad because its more of a gamble the results you will get and it depends on what the marker is like.
